text: Krieg und Frieden (Music for Theatre) is the 10th release for Sascha Ring as Apparat. It was released on 18 February 2013 on the Mute Records label. The album is a music adaption based on a score for a theatrical production of War and Peace. ==Track listing== ==References== Category:2013 albums Category:Apparat (musician) albums Category:War and Peace Category:Music based on novels Category:Adaptations of works by Leo Tolstoy Category:Mute Records albums
title: Krieg und Frieden (Music for Theatre)
